Text: Y-yes... yes, of course. I'm sorry, but you WERE warned. Guard! Escort Mr. Wright out of the courtroom! He is in contempt of court, and must leave.

Name: Maya
Text: Wait!

Name: Maya
Text: I-I was the one who made the outburst, Your Honor! Nick is innocent!

Name: Karma
Text: Hah! What's the difference? All that remains is for the guilty verdict to be declared! Isn't that right, Mr. Phoenix Wright!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wrong!

Name: Karma
Text: What!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Did you hear what Ms. Hart just said? She said she clearly saw Mr. Edgeworth! That was not in the testimony! That changes her testimony, and I have a right to cross-examine her again!

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! Order! Order! Order! Order!

Name: Karma
Text: You're in contempt of court! It's too late for wild claims! Judge! Sustain my objection!

Name: Judge
Text: ... ... I'm sorry, Mr. von Karma, but I cannot.

Name: Karma
Text: What!?

Name: Judge
Text: Ms. Lotta Hart has made a new testimony. The defense does have a right to cross-examine her again.

Name: Karma
Text: B-but he is in contempt of court!

Name: Maya
Text: No, I am! If you're going to arrest someone, arrest me!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Very well. Maya Fey! You will leave the courtroom immediately.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! I did what I could... You have to do the rest! Good luck!

Name: Phoenix
Text: M-Maya...!

Name: Karma
Text: Peh! I care not for this melodrama! Listen well, Mr. Wright! I do not tolerate badgering of my witnesses!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I'm running out of time... I'd better find a contradiction in here or else...)

Name: Judge
Text: Mr. Wright! Begin your cross-examination!

Name: Lotta
Text: I saw it clear as day. The man on the boat was Mr. Edgeworth!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Got you. Got you, Ms. Hart! Finally!

Name: Lotta
Text: Wh-what!? You got what?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Look at this photograph.

Name: Lotta
Text: The photo I took...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: The very same. There's something I want you to see in this photo... it's quite clearly visible. The fog, Ms. Hart.

Name: Lotta
Text: So... so?

Name: Phoenix
Text: This picture was taken with professional, high quality film, correct? Yet even it could not capture the faces of the men on the boat! Yet you claim you saw Mr. Edgeworth! How!?

Name: Lotta
Text: Whut!? Wha--!

Name: Judge
Text: Mr. Wright has a point!

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: That's why I told her not to say that in her testimony! Please!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yet, now she has said it, Mr. von Karma. How could you possibly see Mr. Edgeworth!? Explain yourself!

Name: Judge
Text: Ms. Hart.

Name: Lotta
Text: What!

Name: Judge
Text: Could you see the defendant that night?

Name: Lotta
Text: O-of course! I said I could and I meant I could!

Name: Judge
Text: Then, please testify as to the circumstances of your sighting.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I did it! I finally found a hole in von Karma's carefully vague testimony!)

Name: Lotta
Text: Yer right. It was a cold night, and the mist was thick as grits.

Name: Phoenix
Text: So? How could you see Edgeworth!?

Name: Lotta
Text: Now, just hold your horses for a second! You hasty Yankee types'd never find a gal where I'm from.

Name: Judge
Text: Defense attorneys have trouble with that as it is.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Nobody loves me...)

Name: Lotta
Text: So, once I was finished setting up my camera, I got back in the car.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Your "camera"...?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah. It's got an automatic...

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: The issue we are concerned with here is Ms. Hart seeing Mr. Edgeworth! The camera has nothing to do with this at all!

Name: Judge
Text: Objection sustained.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Argh! He's not letting her answer any of my questions!)

Name: Lotta
Text: Still, I brought my binoculars with me.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: "Binoculars"?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah, binoculars.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yesterday, you mentioned that you were out looking for shooting stars, correct?

Name: Lotta
Text: Well... yeah.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wouldn't you need a telescope, not binoculars, for that?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I've got doubts about your camera, too! Was that really to take pictures of meteor showers?

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: The camera is irrelevant to this case!

Name: Phoenix
Text: You can't say that for certain!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Mr. Wright. Is the camera really relevant to this case? If you believe it is, you may continue with this line of questioning.

Name: Karma
Text: But know this! If you find nothing with this, there will be consequences!

Name: Judge
Text: Well, Mr. Wright? Do you wish to press further about the camera?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (This is make-it-or-break-it time!) The camera is of utmost importance, Your Honor. It is, perhaps, the key to this entire case! Therefore, I will continue my line of questioning! (Wow! Maybe I went a little overboard there...)

Name: Judge
Text: Very well! Ms. Hart! You will testify to the court about the camera!

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah, yeah, I hear ya.

Name: Lotta
Text: The camera was set up to take pictures of a meteor shower.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ms. Hart. What made you choose that lake to photograph meteors? You know the fog gets thick on that lake. It's not very suited to stargazing.

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah, well... Y'see, I... I guess I wasn't thinking too straight! Har!

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: Mr. Wright! I will not have you badgering my witness because of her challenged intellect!

Name: Lotta
Text: Now wait a minute!

Name: Karma
Text: Continue your testimony. You were saying how it was that you saw Edgeworth?

Name: Lotta
Text: Grr...

Name: Karma
Text: No unnecessary comments, please.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: You were photographing shooting stars? That's a lie!

Name: Lotta
Text: S-says who!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I saw the camera you set up yesterday. It was pointed directly at the lake! You have to point a camera upwards to take photos of the stars, Ms. Hart!

Name: Lotta
Text: Ooof!

Name: Judge
Text: Mr. Wright! What are you driving at?

Name: Phoenix
Text: The witness was not at the lake to photograph shooting stars, Your Honor!

Name: Judge
Text: W-well then, what exactly was she photographing?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Your Honor! Take a look at this... What was Ms. Hart trying to photograph at the lake?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Takethat.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ms. Hart. This is what you were trying to photograph!

Name: Judge
Text: What's this? A newspaper article? "Gourdy"...? Ah, the sighting at Gourd Lake...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, Ms. Hart?

Name: Lotta
Text: I... I never heard of no lake monster! You got proof or something? Let's see you prove that I was down at the lake trying to photograph this "Gourdy."

Name: Phoenix
Text: I have it! Proof!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Intriguing!

Name: Judge
Text: Very well, let's see it. And... no joking around this time, please. Here is proof that the witness was trying to photograph Gourdy, the lake monster!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Takethat.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: The proof, Ms. Hart, is your own camera!

Name: Phoenix
Text: You camera was set to take photos in response to loud noises, correct? Thus this photograph here, taken when a gun fired on the lake.

Name: Phoenix
Text: And here, this article about "Gourdy." According to this article... Gourdy made a loud noise when it emerged! Well? You were trying to photograph Gourdy, weren't you! That's why you had set your camera to respond to loud noises!

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! I see... I, too, thought it was a little strange.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Yeah, sure!) Well, Ms. Hart? You were camping there to try and take a photo of Gourdy, weren't you?

Name: Lotta
Text: ... Yeah. Not bad. Are all you lawyers that smart? So, smart boy, I was down there trying to photograph Gourdy, you got me. So what?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh...?

Name: Lotta
Text: That don't change what I saw, does it?

Name: Karma
Text: Exactly! What you just used several precious minutes of our time to prove... is nothing more than that the witness is an idiot who thinks monsters exist!

Name: Lotta
Text: H-hey!

Name: Karma
Text: But, as she so succinctly said, so what!? It changes nothing!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Not true! You were hiding the whole thing about Gourdy for some reason, I know it! But what could it have been...? Whatever it is, I'm getting to the bottom of this!)

Name: Judge
Text: Ms. Hart. Why did you hide the fact that you were searching for Gourdy from the court? Please revise your testimony.

Name: Lotta
Text: ... Right. Fine, I'll testify. It won't change nothing, though.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Something will change... it has to! And I'm going to spot it!)

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Well, Mr. Wright. You may cross-examine the witness.

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: The witness's testimony is unchanged from before! Whether she is a research student or a photographer has no bearing on this case! There is no need to waste more of our time with another pointless cross-examination!

Name: Judge
Text: Er... hmm.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: I claim the defense's right to cross-examine the witness, Your Honor! (von Karma's up to something, I know it! He doesn't want me to cross-examine her because... why? Was there a contradiction?)

Name: Judge
Text: Very well. You may begin the cross-examination. You seem sure of yourself, you must have something in mind.

Name: Karma
Text: Hah! That would be a first!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Hah hah, very funny.)

Name: Judge
Text: You understand that this is your last chance at a cross-examination, Mr. Wright? If there is no problem with the testimony this time, we will let the witness leave. I will announce my verdict at that time, Mr. Wright. Understood?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes, Your Honor.

Name: Lotta
Text: Actually, I'm not a research student at a university.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Then what manner of person are you!?

Name: Lotta
Text: I'm not sure I'm high-falutin' enough to be called a "manner" of anything.

Name: Lotta
Text: I'm an investigative photographer.

Name: Phoenix
Text: An "investigative photographer"?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yep. You get your photo, and sell it to the press. It's that kind of business. Hey, I was taking pictures at my sister's graduation last year... N' guess what!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... what?

Name: Lotta
Text: There was a yoofoh just a' hanging in the sky!

Name: Phoenix
Text: A "yoofoh"...?

Name: Lotta
Text: You know, an "Unidentified Flying Object"? A yoofoh! That's when I had sort of a revelation. I knew I should become an investigative photographer!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I... I see. (Kind of a shaky basis for a career...)

Name: Lotta
Text: Imagine what a scoop it'd be if I got a picture of that monster!

Name: Phoenix
Text: An "investigative photographer"?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yep. You get your photo, and sell it to the press. It's that kind of business. Hey, I was taking pictures at my sister's graduation last year... N' guess what!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... what?

Name: Lotta
Text: There was a yoofoh just a' hanging in the sky!

Name: Phoenix
Text: A "yoofoh"...?

Name: Lotta
Text: You know, an "Unidentified Flying Object"? A yoofoh! That's when I had sort of a revelation. I knew I should become an investigative photographer!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I... I see. (Kind of a shaky basis for a career...)

Name: Lotta
Text: Imagine what a scoop it'd be if I got a picture of that monster!

Name: Phoenix
Text: That's why you put the automatic senior on your camera?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yep. Borrowed it from a friend at a university. It analyzes every sound it picks up, and when it gets a "bang!"...

Name: Phoenix
Text: It snaps a shot.

Name: Lotta
Text: Yep.

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, how many pictures has it taken so far?

Name: Lotta
Text: The only time the camera triggered was that night.

Name: Lotta
Text: But, that's all I was hiding.

Name: Phoenix
Text: I think it's time you told us why you felt you had to hide your true purpose at the lake.

Name: Lotta
Text: Heck, if word got out what I was up to, the lake'd be swarmin' with competitors!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Competitors...?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah! Second-rate shutterbugs trying to steal my scoop!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ah... Is that the only reason you were hiding the truth?

Name: Lotta
Text: W-well, actually...

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: Mr. Wright! I'll not have you asking questions with no relevance to this case!!!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Whatever you say, von Karma. I know you told her to keep quiet.)

Name: Lotta
Text: When I heard the "bang" I looked right straight out at that lake.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Exactly what sort of sound was it?

Name: Lotta
Text: Well, I never heard one before so I can't say for sure... but it sounded like a gunshot. It was a lot sharper a sound than I would have expected.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Hmmm...)

Name: Lotta
Text: There wasn't much else to look at, so I just watched that boat the whole time.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: There wasn't "much else to look at"?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yep.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I dunno. If she heard a bang... and she thought Gourdy was out there... I kind of doubt she'd waste any time looking at a boat.)

Name: Lotta
Text: What? What did I do now? What're you giving me that look for?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Definitely suspicious... Maybe it's time for some evidence...)

Name: Karma
Text: Witness! Continue.

Name: Lotta
Text: Hold your hushpuppies, pops, I'm getting there.

Name: Lotta
Text: Then I saw a flash, near one of the men's hands, and I heard another gunshot.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Was there nothing on the lake but the boat at that time?

Name: Lotta
Text: Huh? Wait, so you're thinking maybe he was shot from some other place? I don't think so, nope. The lake was smooth as glass, and nobody was on the shore, neither.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ms. Hart! Were you REALLY looking at that boat!?

Name: Lotta
Text: W-what's with you!? Course I was looking at it! It was the only thing out there! Any normal person'd be looking at it!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I agree, any normal person would. But you are far from normal!

Name: Lotta
Text: Wh-what!? Y'all wanna step over here and say that!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: You were camping at the lake to take a picture of Gourdy! Think about it-- What would you do if you heard a loud noise? You'd be scanning the lake for any sign of Gourdy, that's what! You wouldn't give the boat a second thought!

Name: Lotta
Text: Aah!

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Continue, Mr. Wright!

Name: Phoenix
Text: You testified that you were watching the boat through binoculars! However, you wouldn't need binoculars to watch that boat! You needed them to search for Gourdy... and that's what you were doing!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well!?

Name: Lotta
Text: Hmph... Well, now that y'all mention it... I did sort of take my binoculars and kind of scan the lake a bit... I mean, Gourdy might be out there, n' all...

Name: Judge
Text: M-Ms. Hart! A-are you saying that you were NOT watching the boat, then?

Name: Lotta
Text: ... S-sorry, y'all. I wasn't fibbing, really. I was, just... I thought y'know, I could be witness to a murder n' all! I kinda got excited. I was sure I was watching that boat... till now.

Name: Judge
Text: ... This... this is totally uncalled for--

Name: Lotta
Text: B-but hey! You got the photograph! You got proof!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Still, we can't see who is shooting who in this.

Name: Lotta
Text: Right! Right! That's why I took this photo n'...

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: Witness... That's enough. You've had a long day. Shut your pie-hole.

Name: Lotta
Text: Sh-shut my what!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (What was she going to say? She took the photo... and what? Wait a second...)

Name: Gumshoe
Text: She even had a photograph to prove it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: But you really can't tell from the photo who is shooting.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: That's why she said she's going to enlarge the photo. She said "it'll drop the quality a mite, but should let us see who's who!"

Name: Phoenix
Text: (She enlarged that photo! Why won't von Karma let her show it? I've got a hunch! I bet that enlarged photo shows something bad for von Karma! This is my chance! If I'm wrong, though, it'll mean prison for Edgeworth... or worse. What should I do!?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ms. Hart! Look at this photograph. You enlarged this photograph, did you not?

Name: Lotta
Text: Y-yeah! I did!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Why has that enlargement not been presented to the court!?

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: B-because it does not exist!

Name: Lotta
Text: What're y'all talking about!? You were the one who told me not to show it in court in the first place! You old fool!

Name: Judge
Text: What's the meaning of this, Mr. von Karma!

Name: Karma
Text: Er... erm...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ms. Hart! Show the photo to the court! Show us the enlargement!

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: The prosecution objects to the submission of this evidence!

Name: Judge
Text: Objection... denied. The witness will show the enlargement to the court.

Name: Lotta
Text: Here it is.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm. We still cannot see who is firing in this. It could be the defendant... or maybe it's not. Regardless, I'll accept this as evidence.

Name: Karma
Text: Happy now, Mr. Wright?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hmm... (There has to be something!)

Name: Karma
Text: You asked for the enlargement, you got the enlargement. And little good it has done any of us! That's why I requested she not show it!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... I suppose this means that the cross-examination...

Name: Karma
Text: Is over! Obviously!

Name: Judge
Text: Then, I would like to close the cross-examination of Ms. Lotta Hart.

Name: Karma
Text: And none too soon. That was a flagrant waste of my time.

Name: Judge
Text: Mr. von Karma, do you have anything to add?

Name: Karma
Text: I stated everything I needed to when this trial began. Decisive evidence. A decisive witness. What else could possibly be required?

Name: Judge
Text: Nothing, of course. Then, I believe it is time for me to declare my verdict.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Wait... it's not supposed to go like this! There has to be a clue in this photo... somewhere! This is bad! Real bad! What should I do!?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Your Honor! There is something decidedly strange with this enlargement!

Name: Judge
Text: W-what might that be? Mr. Wright... You will show the court what you mean! What about this photo is "strange"?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Okay... here goes nothing! I'll show the judge what's strange about this photo.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Takethat.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Here, Your Honor!

Name: Judge
Text: The shooter...? I'm not sure I understand. What about the shooter is strange?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Look at the hand holding the pistol, Your Honor!

Name: Judge
Text: The hand...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: That hand directly contradicts another piece of evidence!

Name: Judge
Text: This man's left hand does what...!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Let me show you. I'll show you the evidence that left hand contradicts!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Takethat.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: The evidence is clear. The man in this photograph is holding that pistol in his left hand. However! The prints on the murder weapon were from Edgeworth's "right hand"! Ergo! The man shooting the pistol in this photograph... Is not Mr. Edgeworth!!!

Name: Judge
Text: Now that everyone in the courtroom has quieted down... I would like to reconvene this court of law! Mr. Wright.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes, Your Honor.

Name: Judge
Text: You have given us definitive proof today. We now know that it was not Mr. Edgeworth who fired the pistol that night. However... This leaves us with a rather large problem. If Mr. Edgeworth didn't do it, then who shot our victim?

Name: Karma
Text: Precisely! As we have seen, there were no other people on the lake that night! Who but the defendant could have shot the victim!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: There is only one explanation remaining! The man who shot the victim was none other than... the victim himself!!!

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! So... you are saying that the victim committed suicide?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes, Your Honor. I can think of no other explanation.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Indeed, that does seem to be the only remaining option.

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: I'm so very, very sorry, Mr. Wright. But suicide is out of the question.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wh-what!?

Name: Karma
Text: An examination of the victim's wound reveals the distance at which he was shot.

Name: Phoenix
Text: The... distance?

Name: Karma
Text: The victim was clearly shot from further than a meter away!

Name: Phoenix
Text: A meter! Th-that's three feet!

Name: Karma
Text: There is no way it could have been suicide!

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! Mr. von Karma! Are you sure of the accuracy of your data!?

Name: Karma
Text: Of course! I had already considered the possibility of suicide, you see.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... I see. Very well, allow me to state my opinion. Considering the situation, the shooter had to be the defendant, Mr. Edgeworth. However! The prints on the gun reveal that the shooter was not Mr. Edgeworth. This is a conundrum. Therefore, I would like to suspend proceedings for this trial for the day. The court orders the defense and the prosecution to further investigate this matter. Understood?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes, Your Honor.

Name: Judge
Text: That is all. The court is adjourned.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Whew, that was a close one.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey! Don't you have anything to say!?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: No. I have yet to be declared innocent, Wright.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, yeah, but... What happened out there on that lake, anyway!? If he didn't commit suicide, then who...? The shooter was about a meter away, too!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: ... W-what? Don't give me that look! I did not kill him!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I was just kidding around.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Hmph.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Look... I'm going to go check on Maya.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Oh... Wright.

Name: Phoenix
Text: What?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Tell her something for me.

Name: Phoenix
Text: What?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: ... ... ... Tell... Tell her to watch what she says in court. That's all.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Yeah, I'm sure she'll be happy to hear you say that, Edgeworth. Jerk!)

Name: Phoenix
Text: I requisitioned a transcript of Lotta's entire testimony. I thought it might give me some ammunition for the trial tomorrow. Of course she didn't see the shooter... So the only part of her testimony that stood was the "bang" she heard.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Maya!

Name: Maya
Text: Hey! Nick, it's you! I'm glad Mr. Edgeworth made it through the day okay. It's a relief...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey. Why'd you do that, anyway?

Name: Maya
Text: ... I don't know. I... just knew I had to do something. I know I'm not the lawyer my sister was... ... I'm sorry.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, you did save the trial... Just, behave from now on, okay?

Name: Maya
Text: O... okay.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey, Detective Gumshoe!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hey, pal! The trial today, it, er... ...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes? What about the trial?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Well, I was going to say "good show," but it wasn't really all that... Though you did save Edgeworth, I guess... I just wasn't sure how to thank you... you know?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Er... thanks.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Detective Gumshoe? Any idea what strategy von Karma is planning for tomorrow?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: It sounds like he's bringing in another witness!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Another witness!? Oh, right, he said something about that in the trial today...

Name: Karma
Text: There were two witnesses!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I was wondering who that other witness was! Er... who was it?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: S... sorry, pal. As much as I'd like to, I'm not at liberty to divulge that information.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Right...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Oh, right... I wanted to ask you something about Edgeworth.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: What's up?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Is he afraid of earthquakes? I never heard anything about that before.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: ... Mr. Edgeworth doesn't talk about himself too much, see. But there's one thing that's clear as day... Him hating crime the way he does... And him becoming a lawyer... And him being scared of earthquakes... It all started with that incident.

Name: Phoenix
Text: The DL-6 Incident?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Yep, that's the one. Fifteen years ago... when he saw his father shot before his very eyes! He still feels the pain now, you can see it in his eyes.

Name: Phoenix
Text: I wanted to talk to you about Maya Fey...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Huh? She's not out on bail yet? That's strange. I told 'em to let her go as soon as they had their report written up. Man... I don't know what would have happened in that courtroom today if it weren't for her. Seeing her getting dragged out by the bailiff... I'll be honest with you, pal. I shed a tear or two. Edgeworth, he was so moved I saw his lip trembling.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Really!? (Cold-as-ice Edgeworth!?)

Name: Gumshoe
Text: He was really grateful for what she did, you know.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: I'm going to head back to the station. I'll get the report on Maya and get her out of there as soon as I can.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Thank you. Oh, wait! Umm... I was wondering, how much is bail going to be?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Don't worry about that. Mr. Edgeworth is posting the whole amount.

Name: Phoenix
Text: What? Edgeworth...?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Didn't I tell you? He's grateful to her for what she did. Alright, pal. Well don't forget to go pick her up, okay?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Hmm... Maybe I can get Edgeworth to pay this month's rent, too...)

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, Nick! You finally came! They just finished the paperwork, I'm free to go.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Free at last, eh?

Name: Maya
Text: Those interrogators were really mean! They were like "okay, what did you do THIS time?" Like I was some kind of criminal! Can you believe it?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, they let you out in the end, didn't they?

Name: Maya
Text: Mmm... Oh, that reminds me... Thanks for bail.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Thank Edgeworth.

Name: Maya
Text: Huh?

Name: Phoenix
Text: He posted bail for you. Said he was grateful for what you did.

Name: Maya
Text: Mr. Edgeworth did that...? ... I have to make it up to him! We've got to win this case, Nick!

Name: Maya
Text: Ahh! Fresh air! I gotta say, freedom feels great.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Behave yourself in the courtroom tomorrow, okay?

Name: Maya
Text: Heh heh heh. Misbehaving's much more fun.

Name: Phoenix
Text: It's not going to be so much fun when Edgeworth refuses to pay your bail again.

Name: Maya
Text: ... Right. I'll behave.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Oh dear...)

Name: Maya
Text: There aren't many cops around today, are there?

Name: Phoenix
Text: They're probably back at the precinct, working up the case against Edgeworth.

Name: Maya
Text: Mmm...

Name: Lotta
Text: Hey y'all!

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, it's Lotta!

Name: Lotta
Text: Y'all really did it today...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wh-what did we do now?

Name: Lotta
Text: Naw, I'm not complaining! See, I did a little thinking. A little... self-reflection, you might say. I realized that bein' a witness is a mighty big responsibility. But I just went up there and started blabbing any old thing that came to mind.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Lotta...

Name: Lotta
Text: So, you see, I want to make it up to y'all.

Name: Phoenix
Text: "Make it up"...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: What did you think of the trial?

Name: Lotta
Text: To be honest, I was doin' it half just to say I'd been a witness... Even though I didn't really see anything. I kinda convinced myself I had though... I'm sorry, I know I caused y'all a lot of trouble.

Name: Maya
Text: Well, memory is a tricky, vague little thing.

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah, I sure know that now. I'll be fine the next time I witness a murder!

Name: Maya
Text: Right!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (You mean the FIRST time you witness a murder...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: What about Gourdy?

Name: Lotta
Text: Right! Well, the way I figure, the trial's only stoking the flames of Gourdy fever! I'll get my exclusive photos and rocket to stardom!

Name: Maya
Text: All right, Lotta! You go, girl! I wish I could be an investigative photographer too!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Finish your spirit medium training first!)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Lotta, what do you mean by "making it up to us"?

Name: Lotta
Text: Well, ya see... Actually, I got a bit of information for you.

Name: Maya
Text: What!?

Name: Lotta
Text: That von Karma didn't want me to say nothin' about it.

Name: Maya
Text: Wh-what information!?

Name: Lotta
Text: Now we're getting to the heart of it! See, I reckoned we might be able to do ourselves a little "exchange."

Name: Phoenix
Text: E-"exchange"? Umm... I thought this was to "make it up to us"...?

Name: Lotta
Text: Right! I propose a little exchange, to make it up to you!

Name: Lotta
Text: What!? Information don't come cheap, my friend!

Name: Maya
Text: Uh...

Name: Lotta
Text: Hey! I see you thinking "my, how unsophisticated these southern folks are"!!! It's written all over yer face! Let me tell you, most southerners are WAY more sophisticated than you... I'm just the exception, okay? Well, what'll it be? We gonna deal, or not!?

Name: Maya
Text: Wh-what should we do, Nick?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (We don't have any other leads so I don't think we have a choice here...) Okay. How much?

Name: Lotta
Text: Huh? You completely off your rocker? I may not be sophisticated, but I'm not trying to rob the poor!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Lotta
Text: The only fair exchange for information is... information! Listen good-- What I need from you is information about Gourdy!

Name: Maya
Text: Whoa-whoa-whoa! G-Gourdy!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: B-but Gourdy doesn't... I mean, Gourdy might not exist!

Name: Lotta
Text: Then bring me proof that shows he don't!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Uh...

Name: Lotta
Text: I'll be keepin' watch from the car, okay? You see something, y'all come to me first, got it?

Name: Phoenix
Text: O-okay...

Name: Lotta
Text: Right! See y'all later!

Name: Maya
Text: Okay, Nick, let's get hunting!

Name: Phoenix
Text: H-hunting...? You don't seriously mean...

Name: Maya
Text: Gourdy? I sure do!

Name: Phoenix
Text: What about Edgeworth!?

Name: Maya
Text: We're searching for Gourdy for him, Nick! Don't you get it!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Okay... and how exactly do we search for a make-believe monster...? Maybe we can find a monster myth specialist?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wh-what's that?

Name: Maya
Text: Th-the Steel Samurai, Nick.

Name: Butz
Text: Yo! Maya!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Larry! What the heck is this!?

Name: Butz
Text: Oh, it was my girl Kiyance's idea... She was all "if you like, put this here, it would be, like, really cool!" Dude, she gave it to me along with the banner!

Name: Maya
Text: Wow! That's really impressive she could find those for you!

Name: Butz
Text: Well, she knows a lot of people. And that show's finished now, so she got 'em for free.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right...

Name: Butz
Text: Yo, Nick! What happened with Edgeworth?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, we made it through the first day in court all right... I don't know how good our prospects are from here on, though.

Name: Butz
Text: Huh.

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, Larry, did you know Edgeworth's secret weakness? He's terrified of earthquakes! He acts like a little boy!

Name: Butz
Text: Huh? That's weird. I don't think he was ever like that in school.

Name: Maya
Text: No? Really?

Name: Butz
Text: Well, we were only in the same class for a year. He transferred schools pretty quickly...

Name: Maya
Text: Transferred?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Right... when the DL-6 Incident happened. Doesn't look like Larry knows about it, though.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey, Larry. What was that big... thing up there before?

Name: Butz
Text: Huh? Oh, the big guy? I've had that for about a month, yeah. It's a big hit with the kids!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Why wasn't it there yesterday?

Name: Butz
Text: Huh? Huh!? Oh... right. Th-the compressor was busted.

Name: Maya
Text: Compressor?

Name: Butz
Text: Yeah--it's that little unit by my hotdog stand. That what I use to put air in the Steel Samurai! It broke a little while ago so I sent it in for repairs.

Name: Maya
Text: Oh. And here I thought you'd inflated it by yourself.

Name: Lotta
Text: Hey y'all! Well? Y'all find anything out about Gourdy?

Name: Maya
Text: Umm... no, nothing.

Name: Lotta
Text: Well, keep moving! It gets cold out here at nighttime.

Name: Maya
Text: It is a little chilly... I... I think I have to sneeze!

Name: Lotta
Text: Wh-whoa! No you don't! No sneezing!!!

Name: Maya
Text: Whaaa-cho!
klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik klik

Name: Lotta
Text: I told y'all NO SNEEZING! See, I set the camera to respond to things a little softer than a "bang." It'd trigger on one of von Karma's finger snaps now!

Name: Maya
Text: Oh... I'm sorry.

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah, well, sorry's nice but what about my film!?

Name: Maya
Text: Nick... pay the lady.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (*sob*)

Name: Maya
Text: What are you going to do if Gourdy doesn't exist?

Name: Lotta
Text: I'll quit being an investigative photographer.

Name: Maya
Text: What!?

Name: Lotta
Text: After all, I only have one photo to my name so far...

Name: Maya
Text: Was it a good one?

Name: Lotta
Text: You bet... a yoofoh!

Name: Maya
Text: A y-yoofoh...?

Name: Lotta
Text: Anyway, if I can't get a career-making photo this time around... Then that's it! I'll quit and go back to school.

Name: Maya
Text: Huh? So you really are a university student?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah, well, I'm takin' a break for a bit.

Name: Maya
Text: Right...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hey there, pal. What's up? You look out of sorts. Wait... you didn't go and do something that's going to hurt Mr. Edgeworth's case again!

Name: Phoenix
Text: What do you mean, "again"!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Whatever, have a seat, pal. I'm here for you if you need anything. Besides money, that is.

Name: Maya
Text: Say, Detective Gumshoe. Do you know "Gourdy"?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: The monster down in Gourd Lake? Not personally, no.

Name: Maya
Text: Well... we're looking for him.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Huh!? Are you out of your minds!?

Name: Maya
Text: Eeek!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: You got time to go wild monster hunting!? How about doing a little questioning for me then!?

Name: Maya
Text: Oh... Detective Gumshoe is scaring me, Nick.

Name: Phoenix
Text: I told Detective Gumshoe about the deal with Lotta.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! Try telling him sooner next time!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Er, sorry.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: ... I see, pal. Sorry for shoutin' at you. ... Okay! I, Detective Gumshoe, will aid your search for Gourdy!

Name: Maya
Text: H-huh!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: I'll loan you one of newest secret weapons for finding evidence!

Name: Maya
Text: Really!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: You can take whichever one you like!

Name: Maya
Text: Okay, give us the goods!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hold on now, everything in due time. First, let me show 'em to you! These are our best and brightest! Introducing Secret Weapon No. 1: "Missile"!

Name: Maya
Text: M-M-Missile?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: He's a K-9 police dog, still in training! Missile! Missile! Here, boy...

Name: Missile
Text: Woof.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Here he is.

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, he's cute! Look, Nick! Cute dog!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (A cute dog... And this will help us... how?)

Name: Missile
Text: Woof.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Next, Secret Weapon No. 2... A fishing pole! Here, this is my own personal pole.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Detective Gumshoe... we're looking for a monster...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Yeah!

Name: Phoenix
Text: How are we supposed to catch a whole sea monster with a fishing pole!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Never know 'til you try, pal!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Okay, this next one is the last one.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (No, please, I'm already overwhelmed by our choices.)

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Secret Weapon No. 3! A metal detector! Here.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Detective Gumshoe... we're looking for something alive.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Right!

Name: Phoenix
Text: How are we supposed to find it with a metal detector!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hey, you never know! It might have been eating soda cans! Well, which will it be!?

Name: Maya
Text: Umm... I can't make up my mind, Nick. They all seem so perfect!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I can't make up my mind, either... for the totally opposite reason. (Oh well, I suppose it can't hurt to borrow one of them.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Can we borrow that metal detector?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Sure thing, pal.

Name: Phoenix
Text: I'm not sure what we're going to find with this...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Remember: you're hunting for a monster. Anything is possible! Anything!

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick! It's beeping! The metal detector's found something!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Sure it loud enough about it. (Whatever it is, it must be in those bushes...) Go check it out, Maya.

Name: Maya
Text: Why do I have to check it out? ... Nick. Look!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh...? An air tank? Huh. The valve looks broken.

Name: Maya
Text: I thought it was Gourdy...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Maya, first of all... Why would Gourdy be in the bushes!? And second of all, why would a metal detector react to a sea monster!?

Name: Maya
Text: Oh.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh? (There's something wrapped around this air tank... It looks like... a string of flags...?)

Name: Maya
Text: Well, we might as well take it with us now that we've found it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (It's heavy...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hmm... Detective Gumshoe isn't here...

Name: Maya
Text: Now that you mention it, didn't he say he had a meeting to go to?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ah, that's right... Let's come back later.

Name: Maya
Text: Umm... So, the tank and the Steel Samurai you were trying to fill up flew away... What happened next?

Name: Butz
Text: Well, all that happened on the 20th or so.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (The 20th... a week ago.)

Name: Butz
Text: Now, as far as I could see, the tank went flying out into the lake. So I went out every night in a boat looking for it. I mean, Kiyance gave me that Steel Samurai after all!

Name: Maya
Text: And when did you find it?

Name: Butz
Text: Just the night before last! It flew way out there! Took me four whole days to find it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (The night before last... was the night of the murder!)

Name: Butz
Text: Sorry for not telling you, Nick. Actually, I was here on the night of the murder. But, you see, I went home before midnight.

Name: Maya
Text: So you didn't know about what happened?

Name: Butz
Text: No...

Name: Maya
Text: That's too bad...

Name: Phoenix
Text: It's not all bad. We've solved one mystery at least.

Name: Maya
Text: A mystery...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Maybe we should go tell her...)

Name: Lotta
Text: Well, Mister Lawyer? I've got the info y'all need! Y'all got the scoop on Gourdy for me yet?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Lotta... There is no such thing as Gourdy.

Name: Lotta
Text: Wh-what!? How can y'all be so sure!

Name: Maya
Text: R-really, Nick!?

Name: Lotta
Text: Y'all got some proof Gourdy don't exist!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: The proof that Gourdy doesn't exist...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Of course I have proof. No lawyer worth his badge would make a claim without proof to back it up. Here's the proof that Gourdy doesn't exist...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Takethat.gif

Name: Maya
Text: Larry's air tank...?

Name: Lotta
Text: What're y'all doing with an air tank?

Name: Phoenix
Text: This... is Gourdy.

Name: Lotta
Text: Umm... scuze me?

Name: Maya
Text: Wh-what exactly are you saying, Nick?

Name: Phoenix
Text: There's a stand near here... a hotdog stand. There's a giant inflatable samurai doll there. About a week ago, an idiot, who happens to be a friend of mine, tried to fill it. He used this air tank, and when the valve blew, the tank flew into the lake. Apparently, it made a pretty loud "bang" when it flew...

Name: Lotta
Text: A "bang"...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: The tank, along with the still deflated Samurai fell into the lake. At the same time... A couple was taking a photograph of the lake. This photo!

Name: Maya
Text: Wait... So... you're saying that Gourdy... Is really the Steel Samurai!?

Name: Lotta
Text: ... ... Well, that's a fine way to ruin a gal's dreams.

Name: Phoenix
Text: I'm sorry, Lotta.

Name: Lotta
Text: Nah, it's okay, you win. I'll give you your info, like I promised.

Name: Maya
Text: Poor Lotta...

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, tell us this "information" you have.

Name: Lotta
Text: A promise is a promise, I guess... I overheard the cops around here saying something about the witness tomorrow... They said he's the caretaker of the boat rental place up the path here.

Name: Maya
Text: Boat rental...? There's someone there? I mean, it looks so deserted.

Name: Lotta
Text: Just an old guy, living all by himself. Y'all should go check it out.

Name: Maya
Text: Thanks, Lotta! We will! Let's get cracking, Nick!

Name: Lotta
Text: Hold on.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Something else?

Name: Lotta
Text: Yeah... the night of the murder. My camera clicked twice, you know.

Name: Maya
Text: ...! Wait... so you have another photo?

Name: Lotta
Text: Well... Yeah, but there's nothing in it at all. Just the lake. I figured it wouldn't be much use as evidence, so I kept it to myself. Well, it might not be helpful at all, but... Here, take it.

Name: Lotta
Text: Bye now. Y'all take care. Time for me to pack up and leave.

Name: Maya
Text: ... Poor Lotta...

Name: Phoenix
Text: It's all Larry's fault. The legend still lives on, I guess.

Name: Maya
Text: The "legend"...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, the legend of Larry, familiar to all who know him for any length of time... "When something smells, it's usually the Butz."

Name: Maya
Text: Hmm. Someone should whip that Butz into shape.

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, Nick! This is the boat shop that Lotta was talking about!

Name: Phoenix
Text: You're right. Doesn't seem to be anyone around at all.

Name: Maya
Text: Well, let's go check it out anyway!

Name: Uncle
Text: Meg! That you!?

Name: Maya
Text: Eeeek!

Name: Uncle
Text: Hey, is that Keith with you!? Where have you two been! I've been worried sick.

Name: Maya
Text: ... N-Nick... you handle this.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Uh, I think I'll leave this one up to you, Maya.

Name: Uncle
Text: Meg!

Name: Maya
Text: Y-yes!?

Name: Uncle
Text: Finally made up your mind, have you?

Name: Maya
Text: M-my mind?

Name: Uncle
Text: You'll run the pasta shop when I'm gone?

Name: Maya
Text: P-pasta?

Name: Uncle
Text: Glad to hear it, glad to hear it! You make your old man proud. When you kids left the house, I didn't know what to think. How'm I supposed to keep this place running, an old man like me? Polly! The kids are home!

Name: Parrot
Text: "Hello! Hello!" *squawk*

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick! What was that!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: A parrot... the one on the perch.

Name: Uncle
Text: Keith!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-yes!?

Name: Uncle
Text: I leave the "Wet Noodle" in your capable hands, sonny.

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick? What's the "Wet Noodle"?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Um, based on the available evidence, I'd say it's the name of his pasta shop.

Name: Uncle
Text: That's a relief, isn't it, Polly?

Name: Parrot
Text: "Hello! Hello!" *squawk*

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup... ... *Zzzzz*

Name: Maya
Text: He fell asleep...

Name: Phoenix
Text: I guess he's relieved.

Name: Uncle
Text: *Zzzzz*

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... a pasta shop?

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup! To think, the "Wet Noodle," will live on when I'm gone! My father started it you know. So that makes you two the third generation! Meg...

Name: Maya
Text: Y-yes!

Name: Uncle
Text: Tomorrow, we'll start with the secrets of dough tossin'!

Name: Maya
Text: D-dough tossing?

Name: Uncle
Text: You, too, Keith.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-yes?

Name: Uncle
Text: You'll be the best pasta wrangler the west has ever seen!

Name: Maya
Text: P-pasta wrangler? The west? I-isn't pasta from Italy?

Name: Uncle
Text: Meg!

Name: Maya
Text: Y-yes!

Name: Uncle
Text: You know the best pasta's always been made west of the Rockies, don't you?

Name: Phoenix
Text: R-right, of course. Everybody knows that.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Maya
Text: How long do we have to keep up this all-in-the-family charade?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (This old man must know something about the murder...! We're not leaving until we find out what that is.)

Name: Uncle
Text: *Zzzzz*

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... this is a boat rental shop, right?

Name: Uncle
Text: What're you talking about!? This here's the palace of pasta, the "Wet Noodle"! Though, now that you mention it, we haven't gotten many orders for spaghetti lately. All the kids come up and say "Yo dude, we wanna ride in one of your boats!" That's why I keep them boats out there. Youngsters these days... Darned if I understand 'em!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I'm pretty confused myself.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick... This isn't going anywhere.

Name: Phoenix
Text: But this old man is the witness tomorrow, right? We've got to find some way of getting information out of him!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... this is a boat rental shop, right?

Name: Uncle
Text: What're you talking about!? This here's the palace of pasta, the "Wet Noodle"! Though, now that you mention it, we haven't gotten many orders for spaghetti lately. All the kids come up and say "Yo dude, we wanna ride in one of your boats!" That's why I keep them boats out there. Youngsters these days... Darned if I understand 'em!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I'm pretty confused myself.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick... This isn't going anywhere.

Name: Phoenix
Text: But this old man is the witness tomorrow, right? We've got to find some way of getting information out of him!

Name: Maya
Text: Wow... what an amazing parrot that is. Good morning!

Name: Maya
Text: Hello!

Name: Maya
Text: He ignored me!

Name: Uncle
Text: *Zzzzz*

Name: Uncle
Text: What, you forgot, Meg? You gotta call her name first!

Name: Maya
Text: Her name?

Name: Uncle
Text: Polly! How ya been!?

Name: Parrot
Text: "Hello! Hello!" *squawk*

Name: Uncle
Text: See?

Name: Maya
Text: Neat! So the parrot's name is "Polly"!

Name: Maya
Text: Too bad all she can say is "hello"...

Name: Uncle
Text: Har har har! Old Polly can say lots of things! You just need to know the secret words!

Name: Maya
Text: The "secret words"...?

Name: Maya
Text: Polly! Polly! What's your name?

Name: Parrot
Text: "Pol-ly!" *squawk*

Name: Maya
Text: Hee hee! Cute!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Maya's found a new friend.)

Name: Uncle
Text: *Zzzzz* ...! That a lawyer's badge?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-yes, it is! (I don't believe it! This old guy is the first person to recognize my badge!)

Name: Uncle
Text: ... I get it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup... I got you figured out now! You're not Keith!

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick! Now's our chance to clear things up!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... sir. No, I'm not Keith.

Name: Maya
Text: And I'm not Meg, either!

Name: Phoenix
Text: We're here investigating a murder that took place on this lake the other night.

Name: Maya
Text: Please, help us!

Name: Uncle
Text: ... Hmm... a lawyer, huh?

Name: Maya
Text: Please, mister...

Name: Uncle
Text: Alright, I'll help. But, on one condition.

Name: Maya
Text: What's that?

Name: Uncle
Text: When this case is over and done... You'll run the "Wet Noodle"!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Okay, we promise.

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick! Are you sure about this?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey, anything to get the case solved. Also... Who wouldn't want to eat "Phoenix Noodles"?

Name: Maya
Text: I... guess so.

Name: Uncle
Text: That's my boy! Good for you, Keith.

Name: Phoenix
Text: W-wait, didn't I just say...

Name: Uncle
Text: You, too, Meg!

Name: Maya
Text: Y-yes!?

Name: Uncle
Text: Heh heh heh... you bring a tear to your old man's eye, you know. Now, what was that you wanted to know? Speak up, Polly!

Name: Parrot
Text: "Hello! Hello!" *squawk*

Name: Maya
Text: Er...

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Now he's talking to the bird again! How do we get him to talk to us!?)

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup, I seen this.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-you know something about this, sir!?

Name: Uncle
Text: Keith.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-yes?

Name: Uncle
Text: It's okay. You can call me Dad.

Name: Phoenix
Text: ... D-Dad! You know something about this!?

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup. The other night... out on the lake...

Name: Maya
Text: Yes? Yes!?

Name: Uncle
Text: I know all about that! I seen it.

Name: Maya
Text: Whaaaat!? Tell us! Tell what you saw!

Name: Uncle
Text: Well, I suppose. Since you're taking over the shop and all...

Name: Uncle
Text: I forget the time, but it was pretty dark outside... probably night, ayup.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (It was after midnight, but okay...)

Name: Uncle
Text: Then I heard this "bang!" So I looked outside. Then I heard another one. "Bang!" A little while later, this boat comes back. Then a young man walked by my window here. He was mutterin' something to himself, ayup.

Name: Maya
Text: What did he say?

Name: Uncle
Text: ... Ayup... ... I forgot. I'll remember tomorrow by court time, promise.

Name: Maya
Text: We need to know earlier than that...!

Name: Uncle
Text: You know what? Eh? Little Terry was just here.

Name: Phoenix
Text: "Terry"...?

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup, that kid next door. You always used to make him cry, remember? He was wearin' this tattered old coat. Got himself some whiskers growing out of his face.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (He must be talking about Detective Gumshoe...)

Name: Uncle
Text: He comes up and tells me to come down to court tomorrow.

Name: Maya
Text: Really...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Somehow I don't think we're going to get much useful information out of this guy.) Maya... maybe we should be leaving.

Name: Maya
Text: I think you're right. Oh, wait--I had one more question.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Maya
Text: Polly! Polly! Have we forgotten something?

Name: Parrot
Text: *squawk* "Don't forget DL-6!" *squawk*

Name: Maya
Text: H-huh!? What did she just say, Nick?

Name: Phoenix
Text: One more time, Polly!

Name: Parrot
Text: "Don't forget DL-6!" *squawk*

Name: Phoenix
Text: (What!? The DL-6 Incident?) Hey, mister! I-I mean, Dad!

Name: Uncle
Text: *Zzzzz*

Name: Phoenix
Text: (This is getting weird... Who IS this old guy!?)

Name: Maya
Text: Why would that bird Polly know about DL-6...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: We have to figure out who that old man is.

Name: Maya
Text: Oh...

Name: Phoenix
Text: What?

Name: Maya
Text: He locked the door, from the other side.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (... Who could that old man be...? I think I need to do a little more research on this DL-6 Incident... Maybe I should ask Detective Gumshoe.)

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hey, pal! Long time no see! ... You don't look so happy. What's wrong this time?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Actually, we wanted to ask you something...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Yeah?

Name: Phoenix
Text: You know the boat rental shop down at Gourd Lake?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Oh, yeah...

Name: Phoenix
Text: The old man who runs it is appearing as a witness in court tomorrow, right?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Huh...!? How'd you-- Hmm. That was supposed to be top secret.

Name: Maya
Text: Do you know who that old man is, Detective?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: ... Actually... I don't. He's a bit of an odd bird... I haven't been able to get a straight answer out of him. I decided first that he wasn't persuasive enough to stand and testify as a witness. That's why we called Ms. Lotta Hart yesterday. As for who he is... We have absolutely no idea.

Name: Maya
Text: Hmm... sounds suspicious!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hmm...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Detective Gumshoe, please, help us...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: H-huh?

Name: Phoenix
Text: We need to know about the DL-6 Incident!

Name: Phoenix
Text: That was when Edgeworth's father died. I can't help but think that it has something to do with this current case.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: ... To tell the truth, I don't know much about DL-6 either. Mr. Edgeworth forbade us from reading the file. So... I'm afraid I can't show them to you, either, pal.

Name: Maya
Text: What!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: However... If you can convince me somehow that the DL-6 Incident is related to this case... Well, I guess I'd consider opening the file up.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: What's that? A parrot?

Name: Phoenix
Text: The old man at the boat rental shop's parrot. The parrot knew about that "incident"...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: That incident?

Name: Phoenix
Text: DL-6.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Wh-what!?

Name: Maya
Text: Polly! Polly! Have we forgotten something?

Name: Parrot
Text: *squawk* "Don't forget DL-6!" *squawk*

Name: Maya
Text: H-huh!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I'm pretty sure that old man must have taught her that word...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Yeah, but how would that old man know about the DL-6 Incident?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wait! What if... What if that old man was connected to DL-6?

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick! You think he might be!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: ... I get ya. Sounds like you need information on the DL-6 Incident. Through there is the Station's Records Room. I'll give you special permission to go in and find what you need.

Name: Maya
Text: All right! Way to go, Detective Gumshoe! Okay, Nick! To the Records Room!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I guess it's time we faced Edgeworth's past...)

Name: Maya
Text: Wow!!! It's amazing.........ly dusty.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ten years of files and ten years of dust, I guess.

Name: Maya
Text: Let's find that DL-6 stuff quick!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Fifteen years ago... both me and Edgeworth were nine years old. We were almost through with fourth grade when he suddenly transferred. Because of DL-6...?)

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! I found out where the file is!

Name: Phoenix
Text: O-oh, thanks!

Name: Maya
Text: Just let me know what you want to know about the DL-6 Incident! I'll go get the right file!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, first I have to get a handle on the main facts... like a summary.

Name: Maya
Text: Right. Summary... summary... Found it! Here you go.

Name: Phoenix
Text: December 28... 2001.

Name: Maya
Text: That's exactly 15 years ago from the day after tomorrow!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (So in two days, the case is closed...) The incident took place in the elevator of the district court.

Name: Maya
Text: What!? Is this the same district court where we're holding the trial now!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Looks like it. There was a large earthquake at 2:00 PM on that day. Part of the court building collapsed, and all of the lights went out.

Name: Maya
Text: Wow... that was some earthquake!

Name: Phoenix
Text: At the time, three people were trapped in the elevator. It took five hours for them to be rescued... Five hours!

Name: Maya
Text: That would be scary like that, in the dark!

Name: Phoenix
Text: There was a lack of oxygen in the elevator, and the survivors were unconscious.

Name: Maya
Text: The survivors...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: One of the three in the elevator had been shot... in the heart.

Name: Maya
Text: That was Mr. Edgeworth's father... wasn't it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (He said that his father was shot before his very eyes... So Miles Edgeworth was one of the other passengers in that elevator.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Do you have data on the victim... Edgeworth's father?

Name: Maya
Text: Yeah, hold on... Victim... victim... Here! Found it!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Gregory Edgeworth, 35, defense attorney. If he were still alive, he'd be 50. He had lost that day's case in court, and got in the elevator with his son, Miles.

Name: Maya
Text: "Miles"...!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Miles Edgeworth, of course.

Name: Maya
Text: So he was on the elevator with his father!

Name: Phoenix
Text: From the angle of the bullet and the other evidence, it could not have been a suicide... The murder weapon, a pistol, was found in the elevator. The pistol had been fired two times. (Where have I heard that before...? Huh...! It sounds just like this current case! What's going on here?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Got any data on the suspect in there?

Name: Maya
Text: Hmm... that would be the guy that my mom got arrested. Hold on... this is it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: The man arrested as a suspect in DL-6 was... Yanni Yogi? He was a clerk in the court, apparently.

Name: Maya
Text: So he must have been the third person in the elevator. Well, then he had to have done it!

Name: Phoenix
Text: But... he was found innocent. Thanks to his defense lawyer, Robert Hammond.

Name: Maya
Text: Hammond... the victim in our case!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right. The suspect, Mr. Yogi was oxygen deprived... so much so he had brain damage. He lost all memory of being in the elevator. After he was declared innocent, he disappeared.

Name: Maya
Text: Hmm... where could Yogi have gone to, I wonder?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (He may be closer than we think...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: I guess I know generally what happened in DL-6 now. I still don't know what sort of impact the whole thing had on Edgeworth...

Name: Maya
Text: Nick. Are we going to take the whole file? There's too much! We'll never get it out.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-you're right. How about we just take what we think we'll need...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right. That's probably all we'll be able to find here. Now, all that's left is the trial tomorrow... I wonder how "Dad" will do testifying in court...

Name: Judge
Text: Court is now in session for the trial of Mr. Miles Edgeworth.

Name: Phoenix
Text: The defense is ready, Your Honor.

Name: Judge
Text: Very well, apparently the prosecution is also ready.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Who is the judge here, anyway!?)

Name: Judge
Text: Mr. von Karma, your opening statement.

Name: Judge
Text: Er... very well, no opening statement so...

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: Not so fast, Judge! I was taking a meaningful pause before speaking!

Name: Judge
Text: R-right, of course.

Name: Karma
Text: A prediction! Today's trial will end three minutes from now!

Name: Judge
Text: Order... order! Mr. von Karma! What is the meaning of your statement just now!?

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: Bah! Must you question everything! It will be over in three minutes! We have no time to waste! I'll call my witness now!

Name: Judge
Text: R-right...

Name: Karma
Text: I call my witness... my decisive witness to the stand!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (It's that mysterious boat shop owner.)

Name: Karma
Text: Witness... state your profession.

Name: Uncle
Text: Mmph... zzzz... ... I, er, am the proprietor of the restaurant the "Wet Noodle" at Gourd Lake.

Name: Uncle
Text: And I, er, also rent boats.

Name: Karma
Text: The night of the incident, you were in the boat rental shop, correct?

Name: Uncle
Text: Er... ayup, yup I was.

Name: Karma
Text: Please testify.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Wait a second... We still haven't heard who this old guy is!)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wait a minute! The witness hasn't stated his name yet!

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: Because I did not ask him, Mr. Wright! Bah! I have predicted this trial will end in three minutes! Stop asking trivial questions and cooperate!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Yeah, right!)

Name: Judge
Text: The witness will state his name.

Name: Uncle
Text: Zzzz... ... Mmph! Well, er... I'm not really sure, ayup.

Name: Judge
Text: What do you mean?

Name: Uncle
Text: My, er, memory...

Name: Karma
Text: Your honor... The witness does not remember anything beyond the last several years... Ergo, he cannot recall his own name.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... he can't recall, you say?

Name: Karma
Text: Yes, but the incident in question took place three days ago. He can testify.

Name: Judge
Text: Very well. Let's hear his testimony then, shall we. Witness?

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm...Very well. I'd like to begin the cross-examination...

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: There is nothing to question in my witness's testimony! Ergo, no need for cross-examination! Besides, there are only 10 seconds left before our three minutes are up! Judge! Your verdict, now!

Name: Judge
Text: Er... yes... M-Mr. Wright...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: What are you saying!? Of course I'll cross-examine the witness!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Very well, you may begin.

Name: Karma
Text: Raaaaaaaaaaaaaargh!

Name: Judge
Text: E-excuse me? Mr. von Karma?

Name: Karma
Text: Three minutes just passed.

Name: Judge
Text: I see. Well then, let's just take our time. You may cross-examine the witness.

Name: Uncle
Text: It was the night of the 24th, just after midnight, ayup.

Name: Phoenix
Text: "Just after midnight," you say?

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup, just around then.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Are you sure?

Name: Uncle
Text: Pretty sure, ayup.

Name: Phoenix
Text: When I talked to you yesterday, you were rather vague about the time... I'm surprised you seem so sure about it today.

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: I asked him, and he remembered. Isn't that right!?

Name: Uncle
Text: Zzzz... D-don't glare at me like that...! I, er... I remembered it clearly, I did. Ayup.

Name: Karma
Text: You see? Continue!

Name: Uncle
Text: I was in the restaurant... where I er... rent boats, as usual.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Is there anyone who can verify that?

Name: Uncle
Text: ... Well, I guess Polly could.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Th-that's not good enough for a court of law!

Name: Judge
Text: Mr. Wright... exactly what's not good enough?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ah, uh, Your Honor, this "Polly" is a parrot.

Name: Judge
Text: A... parrot?

Name: Uncle
Text: Don't be so hard on the girl, Keithy-boy!

Name: Judge
Text: Keith...?

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: The prosecution concedes that we cannot prove the witness was in the shop. Witness... please continue.

Name: Uncle
Text: Then I heard a "bang!" Ayup.

Name: Phoenix
Text: And where did the "bang" seem to come from?

Name: Uncle
Text: From the lake, I figure.

Name: Karma
Text: Are you certain?

Name: Uncle
Text: A-ayup.

Name: Karma
Text: Good. Continue!

Name: Uncle
Text: When I looked out the window, I saw a boat just a' floating on the lake.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Was there someone in the boat?

Name: Uncle
Text: It was pretty far out there... I couldn't see clearly... But I figure there was two men out there, ayup.

Name: Phoenix
Text: But you couldn't see them clearly!

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup... at the time, that is.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (At the time...?)

Name: Uncle
Text: Then I heard another "bang."

Name: Phoenix
Text: So you heard two gunshots total?

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (That's what Lotta said in her testimony yesterday.)

Name: Uncle
Text: Just about then the boat comes back to the shore, and a man walks by my window.

Name: Phoenix
Text: "By your window"?

Name: Uncle
Text: Ayup, by my window. Right outside the window of my little shack.

Name: Phoenix
Text: And, could you see the man's face?

Name: Uncle
Text: Well, the fog was pretty darn thick, but he was right there in front of me. I saw him.

Name: Judge
Text: This is rather important detail! Please add it to your testimony.

Name: Karma
Text: Tsk, tsk, tsk...

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I have a bad feeling about this...)

Name: Uncle
Text: That man was the defendant... he was saying "I can't believe he's dead."

Name: Phoenix
Text: A-are you sure!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Uh oh!) D-Dad!

Name: Uncle
Text: Dead certain, Keith! He said "I can't believe he's dead" as he was walking by, too.

Name: Karma
Text: Witness! Are you sure that the person you saw was Miles Edgeworth!?

Name: Uncle
Text: It was him! That Edgeworth boy!

Name: Judge
Text: ... This... sounds like decisive evidence indeed. I see no room for doubt.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (von Karma... He lured me into cross-examining so he could set me up for a fall!)

Name: Karma
Text: Tsk, tsk, tsk...

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick...! I don't like the way things are going here! Everyone in the courtroom is glaring at us!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I'd better act quick, or this trial is going to be over!)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Your Honor! We proved in yesterday's court that it could not have been Edgeworth who fired the gun!

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: Mr. Wright. Are you referring to the fingerprints from Edgeworth's right hand found on the gun, and the photograph showing a man firing with his left hand...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Exactly!

Name: Karma
Text: That is easily explainable! He could have wiped his prints after he fired! You are ignoring the truth of the matter here! Everything in this witness's testimony is true!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm...

Name: Phoenix
Text: (The judge is lost in thought... what should I do?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Your Honor! This witness claims that Edgeworth said "I can' t believe he's dead"... But his word is all we have! If he were telling a lie...

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: Mr. Wright. In a court of law, the evidence tells all. Apparently, you have yet to realize even this basic fact. If you say his testimony is a lie, show us proof!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Urk...

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! Do we have evidence...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: It's no good! There's nothing I can do.

Name: Maya
Text: A... are you sure?

Name: Phoenix
Text: To be honest... I don't know what to do anymore.

Name: Maya
Text: Please... Can you hear me, Sis? Please... We need your help... Nick needs you...

Name: Karma
Text: Tsk tsk tsk... Three minutes was perhaps too high an expectation. However, fifteen minutes isn't bad! This must be a new record.

Name: Judge
Text: Enough! The witness may leave the stand.

Name: Uncle
Text: Zzzz...

Name: Judge
Text: This court sees no reason to further prolong the trial. Nor is there any need for more time to decide the case against the defendant. This case is extremely clear. I see no room for misinterpretation of the facts.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (W-what!? No!)

Name: Karma
Text: Hmph.

Name: Judge
Text: This court find the defendant, Mr. Miles Edgeworth...

Name: Judge
Text: Guilty

Name: Judge
Text: The accused will surrender to the court immediately, to be held pending trial at a higher court within a month from today's date. That is all. The court is adjourned!

Name: Butz
Text: W-w-waaaaaaait!

Name: Judge
Text: Wh-who was that just now?

Name: Butz
Text: Me!!!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh? Waaaaah! L-Larry!

Name: Judge
Text: Wh-what are you doing here!?

Name: Butz
Text: Listen! Y-you gotta listen to me! I... I was... I was there, in the park, the night of the murder! I... I wasn't sure about it until just yesterday. B-but today I remembered it!

Name: Judge
Text: Remembered what?

Name: Butz
Text: The gunshot! I heard it too!

Name: Judge
Text: O-order!

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: What is the meaning of this!? The verdict has been decided! I call for adjournment!

Name: Judge
Text: One moment, Mr. von Karma. So, you say you heard a gunshot?

Name: Butz
Text: Yeah, I did! A gunshot! That night! I was sitting here in the audience, listening to the testimony... Then I realized, something he said was different from what I remember! A-anyhow, I can't just sit here and let you call Edgey a murderer! It's... It's just not right! I'll testify! Lemme testify!

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! Well, this is the first time something has happened like this in my court. I'm not quite sure how to proceed...

Name: Karma
Text: Judge! You've already given your decision! The trial is over!

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! This is it! Larry's given us one final chance at this!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (She's right! If only it wasn't Larry... He could make things even worse...)

Name: Maya
Text: Mr. Edgeworth was just declared guilty, Nick! It doesn't get any worse!

Name: Phoenix
Text: You're right! Okay! Your Honor! If there is another witness, it is our duty to hear him speak! Right here! Right now!

Name: Karma
Text: A waste of time! The verdict cannot be overturned!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... ... ... Allow me to speak my opinion. In all court proceedings, it is our duty to prevent an inaccurate verdict. In order to make sure no mistake has been made, every witness should be heard!

Name: Karma
Text: Wh-what is this!?

Name: Judge
Text: I withdraw my previous verdict of "guilty"! Mr. von Karma! I order you to call this new witness to testify. Now!

Name: Karma
Text: Whaaaat!

Name: Judge
Text: The court will adjourn for a five minute recess. After that, we will hear this new witness. Court is adjourned!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Whew... That was too close. Sorry to keep you on the edge of your seat like that, Edgeworth.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Hmph. I've seen worse.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Yeah right, Edgeworth. You're sweating bullets!) I just wonder what Larry plans to say in there.

Name: Maya
Text: Larry was at the lake that night?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes... He said he went looking for the Steel Samurai balloon that flew into the lake.

Name: Maya
Text: Oh right. And he found the balloon and the air tank that night?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey, Edgeworth.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: ... Huh? You say something, Wright?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, a lot of things. You seem out of it. What's wrong?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: It... it's nothing.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hmm?

Name: Maya
Text: Umm... Mr. Edgeworth? There's something I've been meaning to ask you.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: What's that?

Name: Maya
Text: Why are your fingerprints on the murder weapon?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Oh. When he fell into the lake, I went into a daze. I couldn't understand what had happened. I couldn't think straight. Then I saw the pistol lying on the floor of the boat in front of me. I picked it up without thinking. I didn't have a reason, really.

Name: Maya
Text: I see...

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Wright...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: This might be our chance.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Our chance?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: von Karma has only ever run perfect trials.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Perfect trials...?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Perfectly prepared witnesses, perfectly complete evidence. That's the secret to his success. This is the first time he's ever had to deal with something unexpected! He has let someone he hasn't even talked to testify before the court! And that someone... is Larry!

Name: Phoenix
Text: What are you getting at?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: It's likely his testimony will be full of holes, Wright.

Name: Maya
Text: That's right, Nick! No ten minute trial this time! We'll milk this one for all it's worth!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey, it was fifteen minutes! Fifteen! (Everything depends on Larry now...)

Name: Judge
Text: Court is now back in session. Witness... Please testify to the court about everything that you saw... on the night of December 24th.

Name: Butz
Text: Right... leave it to me!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Please, Larry, don't mess this one up!!! I hate to admit it, but you're our last chance!)

Name: Phoenix
Text: (von Karma didn't even have time to prep his witness. I just hope Edgeworth is right about this being our big break...)

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... That was an unusually vague testimony, even for this court. In any matter, Mr. Wright, you may begin your cross-examination.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes, Your Honor...

Name: Maya
Text: What's wrong, Nick?

Name: Phoenix
Text: It's Larry! I have no idea what he's going to say if I press him. I'm a little scared.

Name: Maya
Text: Hmm... Well, we've come this far. There's no way to go but forward, Nick!

Name: Butz
Text: That night, I was out in a boat on the lake.

Name: Judge
Text: Something wrong, Mr. Wright?

Name: Phoenix
Text: There were so many things wrong I don't know where to begin...

Name: Judge
Text: Ah...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Um, well, okay. First of all, what time was it?

Name: Butz
Text: Oh, it was after 11:00 when I went out in the boat. By that time everyone had gone home for the night. So I waited until the coast was clear, so to speak.

Name: Phoenix
Text: And why were you out on a boat at such a late hour...?

Name: Butz
Text: I was looking for something and I, er, found it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: "Looking for something"...?

Name: Butz
Text: Er, yeah.

Name: Judge
Text: Mr. Butz, what was it you were looking for?

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: What the witness was searching for is irrelevant! Most likely he was hunting for this "Gourdy"!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (You know, it wouldn't surprise me one bit if that was the truth.)

Name: Karma
Text: This is all irrelevant! Let's get it over with.

Name: Butz
Text: So I quietly slipped the boat back in at the rental shop dock.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Around what time was that?

Name: Butz
Text: Uh... Well, let's see... I figured I was out searching for about an hour... I guess it was around 12:00. Yeah.

Name: Judge
Text: You're not sure?

Name: Butz
Text: Hey! Don't give me that face! I'm not some sort of human sundial, okay!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (People use watches these days, Larry...)

Name: Butz
Text: Then, just as I was thinking about going home, I heard this "bang"!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Where did the sound come from?

Name: Butz
Text: Yeah, well, I wasn't too sure about that. I looked around, y'know.

Name: Judge
Text: Did you look at the lake?

Name: Butz
Text: Yeah, I looked.

Name: Butz
Text: I looked out over the lake, but I didn't notice the boat.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wasn't there a boat on the lake!?

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! Well? Mr. Butz!

Name: Butz
Text: Whoa, whoa. Everybody just calm down, okay? I mean, it was real foggy that night. I'm not sure whether there was a boat out there or not.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Oh, okay, no problem. That's just the MOST IMPORTANT PART of the case!!!)

Name: Karma
Text: Hmph!

Name: Butz
Text: So after I heard that single gunshot I went home.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, you only heard one "bang" correct?

Name: Butz
Text: Yeah.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Huh.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: W-wait a sec, Larry!

Name: Butz
Text: Wh-what!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: You only heard one "bang"!? You're sure!?

Name: Butz
Text: That's what I said!

Name: Phoenix
Text: But Mr. Lotta Hart testified yesterday that she heard two "bang"s! And the old man just now said the same thing! They both heard two gunshots that night!

Name: Butz
Text: Huh?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Were you even listening!? Were you paying attention at all to what they said?

Name: Butz
Text: Yo, Nick, please!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Butz
Text: You know, something's been bothering me. I'm a witness, see? I'm like a customer here! So you got to treat me nice and stuff, okay!?

Name: Judge
Text: Mr. Butz.

Name: Butz
Text: What!?

Name: Judge
Text: You only heard one gunshot? Are you sure?

Name: Butz
Text: ... Umm... Well, to tell ya the truth... I'm not sure.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Not sure!? H-how could you not be sure?

Name: Butz
Text: Yeah, well... I, uh, I might have missed the other gunshot. I was, uh, listening to something else...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Something... else?

Name: Butz
Text: My radio, dude! On my headphones.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Whaaaaaaat!?

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! And stop that booing! M-Mr. Butz! You were listening to a radio on earphones?

Name: Butz
Text: Y-yeah! So what! That a crime!? I listen to my radio! Everybody listens to the radio! What's the big deal!?

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Mr. von Karma... your opinion?

Name: Karma
Text: Waste of time. I do not accept this witness, nor his shoddy testimony.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Well, Mr. Wright? Should he continue the testimony?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Your Honor. Please... please allow the witness to continue his testimony.

Name: Karma
Text: Bah! Nothing is more pitiful than a lawyer who doesn't know when he's lost!

Name: Judge
Text: Very well, Mr. Butz. Please give your testimony, and be sure to include details like your RADIO.

Name: Butz
Text: Right! Leave it to me!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I wouldn't if there were any other way out of this, believe me.)

Name: Judge
Text: You were listening to your radio... at a high volume!?

Name: Butz
Text: Yeah, what's the big problem? Can't a man listen to his radio in peace? Isn't this a free country!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I truly believe Larry has no idea what the problem is.)

Name: Karma
Text: Judge. Can you believe a word this witness says? What he heard was probably nothing more than a drum beat from the radio!

Name: Judge
Text: True enough, it is difficult to believe this testimony.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wait, Your Honor! The witness said he remembers exactly what the DJ said when he heard the gunshot!

Name: Judge
Text: Excuse me? "Dee-jay"...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: An announcer... the guy who says things on the radio. Anyway! What this means is, when he heard the sound, no music was playing! The DJ only talks between songs! So he could have heard the gunshot from the lake! I'd like to cross-examine the witness, Your Honor!

Name: Judge
Text: V-very well, Mr. Wright.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I can't believe I'm continuing this charade...)

Name: Butz
Text: It's lonely, being alone on Christmas Eve!

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, you turned on the radio?

Name: Butz
Text: Right! I just wanted to hear someone's voice, y'know? You don't know what it's like out there, alone, on Christmas Eve! Alone!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I shouldn't have said anything...)

Name: Butz
Text: That's why I was listening to an all-requests show on the radio, see?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Do you by any chance remember the name of the program you were listening to?

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
Text: This has nothing to do with the case, Your Honor!

Name: Judge
Text: Objection sustained. The witness was listening to the radio. That is all we need to know. Tell us, Mr. Butz, how loud was your radio set to that night?

Name: Butz
Text: I was listening to it real booming loud, like.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Real "booming" loud?

Name: Butz
Text: Yeah, y'know.

Name: Judge
Text: And you had headphones on?

Name: Butz
Text: Yup.

Name: Judge
Text: I wouldn't think you could hear anything going on outside at all...

Name: Butz
Text: But I'm sure I heard that gunshot!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Can you prove that...? No... no, of course you can't.

Name: Butz
Text: Nah, I can't prove it. But I remember that moment real clear. I mean, while I was talking about it, it came back real clear to me, y'know?

Name: Butz
Text: I remember exactly what the DJ was saying when I heard it, too.

Name: Phoenix
Text: What did he say?

Name: Karma
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Karma
