I knew how much I was hurting you by distancing myself... but I couldn't bring myself to tell you what I did. I... I was scared. Scared that you'd look at me with those eyes of yours. I was scared of how you'd react if you knew...

Name: Ema
Text: But Sis! You were only doing it for me...

Name: Lana
Text: No...

Name: Ema
Text: Huh?

Name: Lana
Text: I turned my back on you that day. In hiding what I believed to be the truth, I was deceiving you!

Name: Ema
Text: Sis...

Name: Lana
Text: I'm such a fool... It took me all this time to realize it. Ema... I'm so sorry.

Name: Ema
Text: But Sis! You don't have to apologize! I'm happy now!

Name: Lana
Text: You're... happy?

Name: Ema
Text: Of course! You know, Sis, I always knew that one day you'd come back. And now you have!

Name: Lana
Text: Oh Ema... Ema!

Name: Phoenix
Text: No one can change the past. The only thing we can do is strive to make up for our mistakes. Why must we make up for our mistakes, you ask? Because in so doing... we can find the way back to our path. And once we've found our path, we can move on from our past mistakes toward a brighter future. At least, that's what I felt, looking at those two sisters make up.

Name: Lana
Text: Mr. Wright. Mr. Gumshoe.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: M-Me?

Name: Lana
Text: Thank you both, for all that you've done. I'm sure we'll meet again someday. Isn't that right, Edgeworth?

Name: Phoenix
Text: E-Edgeworth...?

Name: Lana
Text: Stop hiding and come over here.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Where was he hiding!?)

Name: Edgeworth
Text: I just came to say... Congratulations.

Name: Lana
Text: Thank you.

Name: Ema
Text: Thank you, Mr. Edgeworth!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Right. Well... I'll be going now!

Name: Lana
Text: Mr. Edgeworth. I hope you don't blame yourself for what happened.

Name: Lana
Text: We were the ones who acted corruptly, not you.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: ... It's too late for me.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: No matter what anyone may say, I realized today that I can't change my own mistakes!

Name: Ema
Text: Mr. Edgeworth...

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Not only that, but I don't even trust myself anymore. Chief Gant was right...

Name: Gant
Text: You despise criminals. I can feel it. You and me... we're the same.

Name: Gant
Text: One day you'll understand. If you want to take them on alone... you'll figure out what's needed!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: I do despise criminals. I planned to dedicate my entire life to fighting them. But in order to fight crime alone, one needs a "weapon." It's scary, but I've been thinking the same thing for quite some time now.

Name: Phoenix
Text: But Edgeworth...

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Who knows? Given enough time, I might have tried to pull something like Chief Gant did. That thought terrifies me. That's why I can't continue on as a prosecutor!

Name: Lana
Text: Edgeworth... Don't you understand? Damon Gant and your mentor, Manfred von Karma...

Name: Lana
Text: were both the best of the best when it came to fighting crime. But they both made the same mistake.

Name: Lana
Text: You said, "in order to fight crime alone, one needs a weapon." That may be right, but think back to today's trial. You weren't alone.

Name: Lana
Text: You were working together with Mr. Wright. And because of that partnership, you were able to present evidence that otherwise would have gone undiscovered. Isn't that right, Mr. Wright?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh? What? Oh, uh... yeah. (What is this, a pop quiz?)

Name: Ema
Text: Come on, Mr. Wright! Show him what Lana's talking about!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Evidence... that neither Edgeworth nor I would have been able to find on our own?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Takethat.gif

Name: Ema
Text: That's the picture I drew!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Our counterattack began with this. You had one half of the evidence list, and I had the other. Apart, we wouldn't have been able to completely restore Ema's picture.

Name: Lana
Text: That didn't just happen by "chance," Edgeworth.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: ... It's time for me to go.

Name: Ema
Text: Mr. Edgeworth...

Name: Edgeworth
Text: If you'll excuse me... there are still some loose ends that need wrapping up. Take care, Chief Prosecutor.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Edgeworth! What will you do now?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, whatever you do, just remember. What happened in this trial can either make or break you as a prosecutor. In the end, it's up to you.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: I know... It seems I owe you my thanks too, Wright. But what I face now... is my problem.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Edgeworth... I'll be waiting for you in court.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: ... Farewell.

Name: Lana
Text: I'd better be getting back too.

Name: Ema
Text: Okay. I'll come visit you!

Name: Lana
Text: It seems we both still have a lot to learn. Here, this is a little something for you.

Name: Ema
Text: "Scientific Investigation"...

Name: Lana
Text: It's the first book I ever bought. Study it well.

Name: Ema
Text: Thanks, Sis! I will!

Name: Phoenix
Text: And so, another case came to a close. As for the sisters... I have faith. Faith that their lives... have only just begun. And as for me... I think it's time I started on a new journey of my own. A journey to rediscover myself.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Well, don't go trekking off just yet, pal!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh? What is it, Detective?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: There's just a little matter to be resolved about the Chief Prosecutor. You see, she isn't supposed to be out of jail like this.

Name: Ema
Text: But...

Name: Phoenix
Text: I thought you said it was okay.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Yeah, well it may be "okay" with me, but the folks at the prison are a different story.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Basically, I had to bribe a guard in order to sneak her out for 30 minutes. Believe me, it wasn't cheap either!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Ema
Text: Way to go, Detective! I didn't know you had a wild side!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Yeah, well... ha ha! You see... Mr. Wright here's the one who'll be footin' the bill.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh? Huh?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: What, you think I could afford that with my salary? You gotta be kiddin' me, pal!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh? Huh? Huh?

Name: Ema
Text: Thank you, Mr. Wright! You're the best!

Name: Phoenix
Text: ... (Why is it... I suddenly feel like I want to scream?)

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Since we're all here, why don't we all go together?

Name: Ema
Text: Yeah, that's a great idea! Come on, guys! Let's go!!!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif
